content.rendered:
• Knowledge in testing mobile applications (iOS & Android) is mandatory.
  • Should be well versed in manual testing, preparing test Cases, Test Data.
  • Knowledge in Payment Gateways will be an added advantage.
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git.
  • One Should have hands on experience in API Testing.
  • Identify, recommend and implement process improvements to enhance the QC process.
  • Work with UI designers to build wire frames with high usability.
  • Determine Test Strategies for the project.
  • Good at Client communication.
